name: BorderDeck amoethyst
description: Please set your theme to "Light" in TweetDeck's settings. BorderDeck amoethyst is a theme for TweetDeck. If you use firefox, you should install amoethyst scrollbar to have scrollbars that match this theme (doesn't work with firefox 57+). Now available on Github
additional_info:
⚠ Some elements of TweetDeck are removed by the theme (dismiss/close buttons, "Tweet" buttons and spinners) Tips:
  1. You close the picture preview by moving your mouse to the top and clicking when a pointer appears.
  2. If you want to tweet use ctrl+enter (don't wait for a "Tweet" button to appear)
